trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" /> event, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" /> event, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Stellt Daten für die Ereignisse <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" /> und <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> bereit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> class contains information for several different Web Parts events that can be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> -Klasse enthält Informationen für mehrere verschiedene Webparts-Ereignisse, die abgebrochen werden kann.

trans-unit.source: These events include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> events.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> class provides access to the Web Parts control involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs> Klasse ermöglicht den Zugriff auf das am Ereignis beteiligten Webparts-Steuerelement.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A> property.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (or server or user control) involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: Das am Ereignis beteiligte <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (bzw. das Server- oder Benutzersteuerelement).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs" /> class.
Gets the Web Parts control involved in the cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: Ruft das Webparts-Steuerelement ab, das an dem aufhebbaren Ereignis beteiligt ist.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> involved in a <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" />, or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />, das an einem der Ereignisse <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing" /> oder <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting" /> beteiligt ist.
